眒字的基本解释

眒
shēn
张目。
疾速“鹰犬倏眒。”

眒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shēn］
［《廣韻》失人切，平真，書。］
［《廣韻》試刃切，去震，書。］
亦作“1”。
(1)疾速貌。
(2)张目。

眒字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　眒； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页804第01
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?試刃切，申去聲。張目也。又引目也。　又【玉篇】疾貌。【史記·司馬相如子虛賦】儵眒淒洌。【張揖註】皆疾貌。　又【廣韻】鳥獸驚貌。【左思·蜀都賦】鷹犬倏眒。【李善註】眒，驚也。　又【廣韻】失人切【集韻】升人切，?音申。義同。　【集韻】或作瞋。

眒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
眒字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shēn]
["Guangyun" is uncharacteristic, plain, book. ]
["Guangyun" try to cut, go to shake, book. ]
Also called "1".
(1) Fast appearance.
(2) Zhang Mu.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Title Department] 　眒; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 804 No. 01
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Try cutting edge, Shen Qusheng. Zhang Mu also. It's also eye-catching.　[Jade Chapter] Disease appearance. [Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Zi Xufu] 倏眒倒洌. [Zhang Yi's Note] They are all ill-looking.　[Guangyun] The amazing looks of birds and beasts. [Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu] Eagle Dog Sui Huang. [Li Shan's Note] Huang, surprise.　[Guangyun] Lost and cut [Jiyun] Ascended and cut,? Yinshen. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】Or make sorrow.
